description:
It had been almost a year since I'd seen Wade. Work and other scheduling conflicts had kept him from being able to come out for a visit. I'd been chatting with him via e-mail off and on and when I told him about Conner he cleared his schedule. In addition to being a great top, Wade is very easy to work with, so I knew he'd be a perfect match for Conner, who hadn't had a lot of experience with anal sex.
Conner was really excited about the idea of getting fucked. I've liked Conner from the moment I met him and I love how comfortable he is with his body.
Conner's hole is really, really tight. Taking Wade's cock wasn't easy for him at first, but Wade was gentle and worked his way up to giving Conner a good pounding. After we were done, Conner tried to stand up and couldn't at first because his legs were weak and shaking from the fucking he had just had!
title: Conner & Wade
